lines.content: > "Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them." - David Allen
Rafayel helps free your mind from remembering every little task.
It‚Äôs designed to be **simple**, **efficient** and **fast**, so you can focus on what truly matters.
- ‚ö° Easy to learn ‚Äì start managing tasks in minutes
- [x] ‚úÖ Task management (add, mark, unmark, delete, list)
